mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(email, fullname, phone_number, password,role, create_at, update_at) VALUES( #{email},#{fullname},#{phoneNumber},#{password},#{role} ,#{createAt}, #{updateAt});
mapper.select: SELECT id, email, fullname, password, address, avatar, phone_number AS phoneNumber, create_at AS createAt, update_at AS updateAt, role FROM user WHERE email = #{email};
